Description: The mod adds a bit of flair to icons! Credits to MysticMismagius and Nidoskull for the artwork! (Mac only)

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Custom Icons
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether custom icons appear or not

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Easter Eggs In Player Panel
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether easter egg icons appear or not in the ability panel

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Easter Egg Icon Chance
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The chance of a different than normal icon appearing for roles

TextInputSettings.Name: Selected Icon Pack
TextInputSettings.Description: The selected icon will start replacing the visible icons with the images you put in. If it can't find the valid image or pack, it will be replaced by the mod's default files
